content:
Funding opportunity in robotic technologies.
The COVID-19 call, by DIH-HERO together with Robotics in Healthcare European network, is targeted at supporting robotic technologies and solutions in the later stages of development that can be deployed in the healthcare sector quickly, to support healthcare professionals in the fight against COVID-19, satisfying a current clinical demand or need. (the applicant should be aimed to finalise the first demonstrator within 4 weeks, while the whole project must be completed preferably within 8 weeks).
Call duration: 10th of April 2020 â€“ 17th of April 2020

https://dih-hero.eu/supporting-professionals-in-the-fight-against-covid-19/

The Swiss federal councils launches a special national research program (NRP) on COVID-19. The program has a total fund of CHF 20 for 2 years.

Official announcement: French | German | Italian

COVID-19 Rapid Collaboration Call for Data Partners

The European Health Data and Evidence Network (EHDEN) will provide financial and technical support to harmonise your COVID-19 patient data to a standard model.

EHDEN proposes to assist potential data partners who have representative and relevant COVID-19 clinical data. It will provide financial and technical support to assist with harmonising the data to the OMOP common data model, with a view to linking data partners together and with other researchers.

Successful applicants will receive up to 50 000 euro each to cover their internal expenses.

The call is open until 14 May 2020.

http://www.ehden.eu/04-2020-covid19-data-partner-call/

Medical technologies, Digital tools and Artificial Intelligence (AI) analytics to improve surveillance and care at high Technology Readiness Levels (TRL)

SC1-PHE-CORONAVIRUS-2020-2B

Notes:

  • Deadline very short: 11 June 2020 17:00:00 Brussels time
  • Innovation Action: 70% funding of the eligible costs
  • Consortium of three partners is needed
  • There has been a webstream on 20 May related to that topic: YouTube - Webinar - Horizon2020 call on Covid19
